subject: p14851532
History: Recent MRSA bacteremia with drenching sweats, nausea and vomiting.
Findings: The heart is again mildly enlarged. The mediastinal and hilar contours appear unchanged. Pleural effusions have more fully resolved. There is persistent patchy opacification of the right mid upper and left upper lungs, which are background findings. Streaky left basilar opacity also has improved. Pulmonary edema has more fully resolved. A PICC line again terminates in the superior vena cava.
